anya-e0102n4:2_0: 525. Dhātūnaṁ anantaraṁ uddiṭṭhāni pana indriyānīti bāvīsatindriyāni – cakkhundriyaṁ
anya-e0102n4:2_1: sotindriyaṁ ghānindriyaṁ jivhindriyaṁ kāyindriyaṁ manindriyaṁ itthindriyaṁ purisindriyaṁ
anya-e0102n4:2_2: jīvitindriyaṁ sukhindriyaṁ dukkhindriyaṁ somanassindriyaṁ domanassindriyaṁ upekkhindriyaṁ
anya-e0102n4:2_3: saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ
anya-e0102n4:4: Bhedābhedā tathā kiccā, bhūmito ca vinicchayaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:5_0: Tattha cakkhādīnaṁ tāva cakkhatīti cakkhūtiādinā nayena attho pakāsito. Pacchimesu
anya-e0102n4:5_1: pana tīsu paṭhamaṁ pubbabhāge anaññātaṁ amataṁ padaṁ catusaccadhammaṁ vā jānissāmīti
anya-e0102n4:5_2: evaṁ paṭipannassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti
anya-e0102n4:5_3: vuttaṁ. Dutiyaṁ ājānanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññindriyaṁ. Tatiyaṁ aññātāvino
anya-e0102n4:5_4: catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitaññāṇakiccassa khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññātāvindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:6_0: Ko pana nesaṁ indriyaṭṭho nāmāti? Indaliṅgaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho. Indadesitaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho.
anya-e0102n4:6_1: Indadiṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho. Indasiṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho. Indajuṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho.
anya-e0102n4:6_2: So sabbopi idha yathāyogaṁ yujjati. Bhagavā hi sammāsambuddho paramissariyabhāvato
anya-e0102n4:6_3: indo. Kusalākusalañca kammaṁ, kammesu kassaci issariyābhāvato. Tenevettha kammasañjanitāni
anya-e0102n4:6_4: tāva indriyāni kusalākusalakammaṁ ulliṅgenti. Tena ca siṭṭhānīti indaliṅgaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n4:6_5: indasiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni. Sabbāneva panetāni bhagavatā yathābhūtato pakāsitāni
anya-e0102n4:6_6: abhisambuddhāni cāti indadesitaṭṭhena indadiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni. Teneva bhagavatā
anya-e0102n4:6_7: munindena kānici gocarāsevanāya kānici bhāvanāsevanāya sevitānīti indajuṭṭhaṭṭhenāpi indriyāni.
anya-e0102n4:7_0: Apica ādhipaccasaṅkhātena issariyaṭṭhenāpi etāni indriyāni. Cakkhuviññāṇādippavattiyañhi
anya-e0102n4:7_1: cakkhādīnaṁ siddhaṁ ādhipaccaṁ, tasmiṁ tikkhe tikkhattā mande ca mandattāti. Ayaṁ
anya-e0102n4:8_1: attho. Tāni ca nesaṁ lakkhaṇādīni khandhaniddese vuttāneva. Paññindriyādīni hi cattāri
anya-e0102n4:8_2: atthato amohoyeva. Sesāni tattha sarūpeneva āgatāni.
anya-e0102n4:9_0: 526.Kamatoti ayampi desanākkamova. Tattha ajjhattadhamme pariññāya ariyabhūmipaṭilābho
anya-e0102n4:9_1: hotīti attabhāvapariyāpannāni cakkhundriyādīni paṭhamaṁ desitāni. So pana attabhāvo
anya-e0102n4:9_2: yaṁ dhammaṁ upādāya itthīti vā purisoti vā saṅkhaṁ gacchati, ayaṁ soti nidassanatthaṁ
anya-e0102n4:9_3: tato itthindriyaṁ purisindriyañca. So duvidhopi jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhavuttīti ñāpanatthaṁ
anya-e0102n4:9_4: tato jīvitindriyaṁ. Yāva tassa pavatti, tāva etesaṁ vedayitānaṁ anivatti. Yañca kiñci
anya-e0102n4:9_5: vedayitaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ dukkhanti ñāpanatthaṁ tato sukhindriyādīni. Taṁnirodhatthaṁ
anya-e0102n4:9_6: pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbāti paṭipattidassanatthaṁ tato saddhādīni. Imāya paṭipattiyā
anya-e0102n4:9_7: esa dhammo paṭhamaṁ attani pātubhavatīti paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanatthaṁ tato
anya-e0102n4:9_8: anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ. Tasseva phalattā tato anantaraṁ bhāvetabbato ca tato aññindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:9_9: Tato paraṁ bhāvanāya imassa adhigamo, adhigate ca pana imasmiṁ natthi kiñci uttari
anya-e0102n4:9_10: karaṇīyanti ñāpanatthaṁ ante paramassāsabhūtaṁ aññātāvindriyaṁ desitanti ayamettha kamo.
anya-e0102n4:10: Bhedābhedāti jīvitindriyasseva cettha bhedo. Tañhi rūpajīvitindriyaṁ arūpajīvitindriyanti duvidhaṁ hoti. Sesānaṁ abhedoti evamettha bhedābhedato vinicchayaṁ vijāniyā.
anya-e0102n4:11_0: 527.Kiccāti kiṁ indriyānaṁ kiccanti ce. Cakkhundriyassa tāva “cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0102n4:11_1: taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato yaṁ taṁ indriyapaccayabhāvena
anya-e0102n4:11_3: attākārānuvattāpanaṁ, idaṁ kiccaṁ. Evaṁ sotaghānajivhākāyānaṁ. Manindriyassa pana
anya-e0102n4:11_6: sahajātadhamme abhibhavitvā yathāsakaṁ oḷārikākārānupāpanaṁ. Upekkhindriyassa santapaṇītamajjhattākārānupāpanaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:12_3: Avasāne tīṇi lokuttarānevāti evamettha bhūmitopi vinicchayaṁ vijāneyya. Evaṁ hi vijānanto –
anya-e0102n4:17_0: 529. Tadanantarāni pana saccānīti cattāri ariyasaccāni – dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhasamudayo
anya-e0102n4:17_1: ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccanti. Tattha –
anya-e0102n4:24_0: Tattha vibhāgatoti dukkhādīnaṁ hi cattāro cattāro atthā vibhattā tathā avitathā anaññathā,
anya-e0102n4:24_1: ye dukkhādīni abhisamentehi abhisametabbā. Yathāha – “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho
anya-e0102n4:24_2: santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho, ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
anya-e0102n4:24_3: Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho nidānaṭṭho saṁyogaṭṭho palibodhaṭṭho. Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho
anya-e0102n4:24_4: vivekaṭṭho asaṅkhataṭṭho amataṭṭho. Maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetuṭṭho dassanaṭṭho adhipateyyaṭṭho.
anya-e0102n4:24_5: Ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā”ti. Tathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho
anya-e0102n4:24_6: saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādi. Iti evaṁ vibhattānaṁ
anya-e0102n4:24_7: catunnaṁ catunnaṁ atthānaṁ vasena dukkhādīni veditabbānīti. Ayaṁ tāvettha vibhāgato vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n4:25_0: 530. Nibbacanalakkhaṇādippabhedatoti ettha pana nibbacanato tāva idha du-iti ayaṁ
anya-e0102n4:25_1: saddo kucchite dissati. Kucchitaṁ hi puttaṁ dupputtoti vadanti. Khaṁ-saddo pana tucche.
anya-e0102n4:25_2: Tucchaṁ hi ākāsaṁ “kha”nti vuccati. Idañca paṭhamasaccaṁ kucchitaṁ anekaupaddavādhiṭṭhānato.
anya-e0102n4:26_0: Saṁ-iti ca ayaṁ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu saṁyogaṁ dīpeti. U-iti ayaṁ “uppannaṁ
anya-e0102n4:26_1: udita”ntiādīsu uppattiṁ. Aya-saddo kāraṇaṁ dīpeti. Idañcāpi dutiyasaccaṁ avasesapaccayasamāyoge
anya-e0102n4:26_2: sati dukkhassuppattikāraṇaṁ. Iti dukkhassa saṁyoge uppattikāraṇattā dukkhasamudayanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:27_0: Tatiyasaccaṁ pana yasmā ni-saddo abhāvaṁ, rodha-saddo ca cārakaṁ dīpeti. Tasmā abhāvo
anya-e0102n4:27_1: ettha saṁsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā, samadhigate vā tasmiṁ
anya-e0102n4:27_2: saṁsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti, tappaṭipakkhattātipi dukkhanirodhanti
anya-e0102n4:28: Catutthasaccaṁ pana yasmā etaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ gacchati ārammaṇavasena tadabhimukhabhūtattā, paṭipadā ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyā. Tasmā dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:29_0: 531. Yasmā panetāni buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n4:29_1: Yathāha “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni. Katamāni…pe… imāni kho, bhikkhave,
anya-e0102n4:29_2: cattāri ariyasaccāni. Ariyā imāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:29_3: Apica ariyassa saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha “sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… manussāya
anya-e0102n4:29_4: tathāgato ariyo, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti. Atha vā etesaṁ abhisambuddhattā
anya-e0102n4:29_5: ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha – “imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ
anya-e0102n4:29_6: yathābhūtaṁ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho ariyoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:29_7: Apica kho pana ariyāni saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Ariyānīti tathāni avitathāni avisaṁvādakānīti
anya-e0102n4:29_8: attho. Yathāha – “imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni,
anya-e0102n4:29_9: tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti evamettha nibbacanato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:30_0: 532. Kathaṁ lakkhaṇādippabhedato? Ettha hi bādhanalakkhaṇaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, santāpanarasaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:30_4: paṭipāṭiyā. Tathā saṅkhatataṇhā asaṅkhatadassanalakkhaṇāni cāti evamettha lakkhaṇādippabhedato
anya-e0102n4:31_0: 533.Atthatthuddhāratocevāti ettha pana atthato tāva ko saccaṭṭhoti ce? Yo paññācakkhunā
anya-e0102n4:31_1: upaparikkhamānānaṁ māyāva viparīto, marīciva visaṁvādako, titthiyānaṁ attāva anupalabbhasabhāvo
anya-e0102n4:31_2: ca na hoti, atha kho bādhanappabhavasantiniyyānappakārena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena
anya-e0102n4:31_3: ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva. Esa aggilakkhaṇaṁ viya, lokapakati viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo
anya-e0102n4:31_4: saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathāha – “idaṁ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṁ avitathametaṁ
anya-e0102n4:32: Nābādhakaṁ yato dukkhaṁ, dukkhā aññaṁ na bādhakaṁ;
anya-e0102n4:34: Taṁ vinā nāññato dukkhaṁ, na hoti na ca taṁ tato;
anya-e0102n4:36: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṁ na ca na taṁ yato;
anya-e0102n4:38: Maggā aññaṁ na niyyānaṁ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
anya-e0102n4:43_0: 534. Kathaṁ atthuddhārato? Idhāyaṁ sacca-saddo anekesu atthesu dissati. Seyyathidaṁ
anya-e0102n4:43_1: – “saccaṁ bhaṇe na kujjheyyā”tiādīsu vācāsacce. “Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā cā”tiādīsu
anya-e0102n4:43_2: viratisacce. “Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā pavādiyāse kusalāvadānā”tiādīsu diṭṭhisacce.
anya-e0102n4:43_3: “Ekaṁ hi saccaṁ na dutiya”ntiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca. “Catunnaṁ
anya-e0102n4:43_4: ariyasaccānaṁ kati kusalā”tiādīsu ariyasacce. Svāyamidhāpi ariyasacce vattatīti evamettha
anya-e0102n4:44_0: 535.Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana cattāreva ariyasaccāni vuttāni anūnāni anadhikānīti
anya-e0102n4:44_1: ce? Aññassāsambhavato aññatarassa ca apaneyyābhāvato. Na hi etehi aññaṁ adhikaṁ vā,
anya-e0102n4:44_2: etesaṁ vā ekampi apanetabbaṁ sambhoti. Yathāha – “idha, bhikkhave, āgaccheyya samaṇo
anya-e0102n4:44_3: vā brāhmaṇo vā ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, aññaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ. Ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ
anya-e0102n4:44_4: ariyasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā aññaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n4:44_5: Yathā cāha – “yo hi koci, bhikkhave, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁ vadeyya ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ
anya-e0102n4:44_6: paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yaṁ samaṇena gotamena desitaṁ, ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ
anya-e0102n4:44_7: paccakkhāya aññaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n4:45_0: Apica pavattimācikkhanto bhagavā sahetukaṁ ācikkhi, nivattiñca saupāyaṁ. Iti pavattinivattitadubhayahetūnaṁ
anya-e0102n4:45_3: vasenāpi cattāreva vuttānīti evamettha anūnādhikato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:46_0: 536.Kamatoti ayampi desanākkamova. Ettha ca oḷārikattā, sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca
anya-e0102n4:46_1: suviññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṁ paṭhamaṁ vuttaṁ. Tasseva hetudassanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ
anya-e0102n4:46_2: samudayasaccaṁ. Hetunirodhā phalanirodhoti ñāpanatthaṁ tato nirodhasaccaṁ. Tadadhigamupāyadassanatthaṁ
anya-e0102n4:46_3: ante maggasaccaṁ. Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṁ vā sattānaṁ saṁvegajananatthaṁ paṭhamaṁ
anya-e0102n4:46_4: dukkhamāha. Taṁ neva akataṁ āgacchati, na issaranimmānādito hoti, ito pana hotīti
anya-e0102n4:46_5: ñāpanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ samudayaṁ. Tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṁviggamānasānaṁ
anya-e0102n4:46_6: dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṁ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṁ nirodhaṁ. Tato nirodhādhigamatthaṁ
anya-e0102n4:46_7: nirodhasampāpakaṁ magganti evamettha kamato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:47_0: 537.Jātiādīnaṁ nicchayāti ye te ariyasaccāni niddisantena bhagavatā “jātipi dukkhā,
anya-e0102n4:47_1: jarāpi dukkhā, maraṇampi dukkhaṁ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsāpi dukkhā, appiyehi
anya-e0102n4:47_2: sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ, saṁkhittena
anya-e0102n4:47_3: pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti dukkhaniddese dvādasa dhammā, “yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobbhavikā
anya-e0102n4:47_4: nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī. Seyyathidaṁ, kāmataṇhā, bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhā”ti
anya-e0102n4:47_5: samudayaniddese tividhā taṇhā, “yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo
anya-e0102n4:47_6: mutti anālayo”ti evaṁ nirodhaniddese atthato ekameva nibbānaṁ, “katamaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadā
anya-e0102n4:47_7: ariyasaccaṁ, ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Seyyathidaṁ – sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhī”ti
anya-e0102n4:47_8: evaṁ magganiddese aṭṭha dhammāti iti catunnaṁ saccānaṁ niddese jātiādayo dhammā vuttā,
anya-e0102n4:47_9: tesaṁ jātiādīnaṁ nicchayāpi ettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:50_0: Seyyathidaṁ, ayañhi jāti-saddo anekattho. Tathā hesa “ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo”ti
anya-e0102n4:50_1: ettha bhave āgato. “Atthi, visākhe, nigaṇṭhā nāma samaṇajātī”ti ettha nikāye. “Jāti
anya-e0102n4:50_2: dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahitā”ti ettha saṅkhatalakkhaṇe. “Yaṁ mātukucchismiṁ paṭhamaṁ
anya-e0102n4:50_3: cittaṁ uppannaṁ, paṭhamaṁ viññāṇaṁ pātubhūtaṁ, tadupādāya sāvassa jātī”ti ettha paṭisandhiyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:50_4: “Sampatijāto, ānanda, bodhisatto”ti ettha pasūtiyaṁ. “Akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādenā”ti
anya-e0102n4:50_5: ettha kule. “Yatohaṁ, bhagini, ariyāya jātiyā jāto”ti ettha ariyasīle.
anya-e0102n4:51_0: 538. Svāyamidha gabbhaseyyakānaṁ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchimhā nikkhamanaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:51_1: tāva pavattesu khandhesu. Itaresaṁ paṭisandhikhandhesvevāti daṭṭhabbo. Ayampi ca
anya-e0102n4:51_2: pariyāyakathāva. Nippariyāyato pana tattha tattha nibbattamānānaṁ sattānaṁ ye ye
anya-e0102n4:51_3: khandhā pātubhavanti, tesaṁ tesaṁ paṭhamapātubhāvo jāti nāma.
anya-e0102n4:52: Sā panesā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā, niyyātanarasā, atītabhavato idha ummujjanapaccupaṭṭhānā, dukkhavicittatāpaccupaṭṭhānā vā.
anya-e0102n4:53_0: 539. Kasmā panesā dukkhāti ce? Anekesaṁ dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvato. Anekāni hi dukkhāni.
anya-e0102n4:54: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhā vedanāsabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā dukkhadukkhanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:56_0: Upekkhā vedanā ceva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayappaṭipīḷitattā saṅkhāradukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:56_2: jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato paṭicchannadukkhaṁ nāma. Apākaṭadukkhantipi vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:57: Dvattiṁsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno ābādho apucchitvāva jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato appaṭicchannadukkhaṁ nāma. Pākaṭadukkhantipi vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:58: Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṁ sesaṁ dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṁ jātiādi sabbampi tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhāvato pariyāyadukkhaṁ. Dukkhadukkhaṁ pana nippariyāyadukkhanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:59_0: Tatrāyaṁ jāti yaṁ taṁ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṁ āpāyikaṁ
anya-e0102n4:59_1: dukkhaṁ, yañca sugatiyampi manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṁ dukkhaṁ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n4:60_0: 540. Tatridaṁ gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṁ dukkhaṁ – ayaṁ hi satto mātukucchimhi nibbattamāno
anya-e0102n4:60_1: na uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīsu nibbattati, atha kho heṭṭhā āmāsayassa upari pakkāsayassa
anya-e0102n4:60_3: adhimattajegucche kucchipadese pūtimacchapūtikummāsacandanikādīsu kimi viya nibbattati.
anya-e0102n4:60_4: So tattha nibbatto dasa māse mātukucchisambhavena usmanā puṭapākaṁ viya paccamāno
anya-e0102n4:60_5: piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya sediyamāno samiñjanapasāraṇādirahito adhimattaṁ dukkhamanubhotīti,
anya-e0102n4:61_0: Yaṁ pana so mātu sahasā upakkhalanagamananisīdanavuṭṭhānaparivattanādīsu surādhuttahatthagato
anya-e0102n4:61_1: eḷako viya ahituṇḍikahatthagato sappapotako viya ca ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaodhūnananiddhūnanādinā
anya-e0102n4:61_2: upakkamena adhimattaṁ dukkhamanubhavati, yañca mātu sītūdakapānakāle sītanarakupapanno
anya-e0102n4:61_4: khārāpaṭicchakādikammakāraṇapatto viya tibbaṁ dukkhamanubhoti, idaṁ gabbhapariharaṇamūlakaṁ dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:62: Yaṁ panassa mūḷhagabbhāya mātuyā mittāmaccasuhajjādīhipi adassanārahe dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne chedanaphālanādīhi dukkhaṁ uppajjati, idaṁ gabbhavipattimūlakaṁ dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:63_0: Yaṁ vijāyamānāya mātuyā kammajehi vātehi parivattetvā narakapapātaṁ viya atibhayānakaṁ
anya-e0102n4:63_1: yonimaggaṁ paṭipātiyamānassa paramasambādhena yonimukhena tāḷacchiggaḷena viya nikkaḍḍhiyamānassa
anya-e0102n4:63_2: mahānāgassa narakasattassa viya ca saṅghātapabbatehi vicuṇṇiyamānassa dukkhaṁ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n4:64_1: sūcimukhakhuradhārāhi vijjhanaphālanasadisaṁ dukkhaṁ uppajjati, idaṁ mātukucchito
anya-e0102n4:65_0: Yaṁ tato paraṁ pavattiyaṁ attanāva attānaṁ vadhentassa acelakavatādivasena ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyuttassa,
anya-e0102n4:65_1: kodhavasena abhuñjantassa, ubbandhantassa ca dukkhaṁ uppajjati, idaṁ attūpakkamamūlakaṁ
anya-e0102n4:65_2: dukkhaṁ. Yaṁ pana parato vadhabandhanādīni anubhavantassa uppajjati, idaṁ parūpakkamamūlakaṁ dukkhanti.
anya-e0102n4:66: Iti imassa sabbassāpi dukkhassa ayaṁ jāti vatthumeva hoti.
anya-e0102n4:74: Yaṁ taṁ kathaṁ tattha bhaveyya jātiṁ,
anya-e0102n4:82: Na taṁ bhave tattha na cassa jāti,
anya-e0102n4:87: Jātiṁ vinā itipi jāti ayañhi dukkhā.
anya-e0102n4:88: Kiṁ bhāsitena bahunā nanu yaṁ kuhiñci,
anya-e0102n4:94_0: 542.Jarāpi dukkhāti ettha duvidhā jarā saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca, khaṇḍiccādisammato santatiyaṁ
anya-e0102n4:94_1: ekabhavapariyāpannakhandhapurāṇabhāvo ca, sā idha adhippetā. Sā panesā jarā khandhaparipākalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n4:94_4: kāyikacetasikadukkhaṁ uppajjati, jarā tassa vatthu. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:99: “Pappoti dukkhaṁ yaṁ macco, kāyikaṁ mānasaṁ tathā;
anya-e0102n4:100: Sabbametaṁ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhā”ti.
anya-e0102n4:103_0: 543.Maraṇampi dukkhanti etthāpi duvidhaṁ maraṇaṁ saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca, yaṁ sandhāya
anya-e0102n4:103_2: ca, yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ “niccaṁ maraṇato bhaya”nti. Taṁ idha adhippetaṁ. Jātipaccayā
anya-e0102n4:103_3: maraṇaṁ upakkamamaraṇaṁ sarasamaraṇaṁ āyukkhayamaraṇaṁ puññakkhayamaraṇantipi tasseva
anya-e0102n4:103_4: nāmaṁ. Tayidaṁ cutilakkhaṇaṁ, viyogarasaṁ, gativippavāsapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ. Dukkhassa
anya-e0102n4:103_5: pana vatthubhāvato dukkhanti veditabbaṁ. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:113_0: 544. Sokādīsu soko nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa cittasantāpo. So kiñcāpi atthato
anya-e0102n4:113_1: domanassameva hoti. Evaṁ santepi antonijjhānalakkhaṇo, cetaso parijjhāpanaraso, anusocanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0102n4:113_2: Dukkho pana dukkhadukkhato dukkhavatthuto ca. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:117: Dukkhampi vividhaṁ yasmā, tasmā dukkhoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:120_0: 545.Paridevo nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa vacīpalāpo. So lālappanalakkhaṇo, guṇadosakittanaraso,
anya-e0102n4:120_1: sambhamapaccupaṭṭhāno. Dukkho pana saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato dukkhavatthuto ca. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:127_0: 546.Dukkhaṁ nāma kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ, taṁ kāyapīḷanalakkhaṇaṁ, duppaññānaṁ domanassakaraṇarasaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:127_1: kāyikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ. Dukkhaṁ pana dukkhadukkhato mānasadukkhāvahanato ca. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:129: Janayati yasmā tasmā, dukkhanti visesato vutta”nti.
anya-e0102n4:132_0: 547.Domanassaṁ nāma mānasaṁ dukkhaṁ. Taṁ cittapīḷanalakkhaṇaṁ, manovighātarasaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:132_1: mānasabyādhipaccupaṭṭhānaṁ. Dukkhaṁ pana dukkhadukkhato kāyikadukkhāvahanato ca.
anya-e0102n4:132_2: Cetodukkhasamappitā hi kese pakiriya kandanti, urāni paṭipisanti, āvaṭṭanti, vivaṭṭanti,
anya-e0102n4:132_3: uddhaṁpādaṁ papatanti, satthaṁ āharanti, visaṁ khādanti, rajjuyā ubbandhanti, aggiṁ
anya-e0102n4:132_4: pavisantīti taṁ nānappakārakaṁ dukkhamanubhavanti. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:133: “Pīḷeti yato cittaṁ, kāyassa ca pīḷanaṁ samāvahati;
anya-e0102n4:137_1: Saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno eko dhammoti eke. So cittaparidahanalakkhaṇo, nitthunanaraso,
anya-e0102n4:137_2: visādapaccupaṭṭhāno. Dukkho pana saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato cittaparidahanato kāyavisādanato
anya-e0102n4:138: “Cittassa ca paridahanā, kāyassa visādanā ca adhimattaṁ;
anya-e0102n4:139: Yaṁ dukkhamupāyāso, janeti dukkho tato vutto”ti.
anya-e0102n4:141_0: Ettha ca mandagginā antobhājane pāko viya soko. Tikkhagginā paccamānassa bhājanato
anya-e0102n4:141_1: bahinikkhamanaṁ viya paridevo. Bahinikkhantāvasesassa nikkhamituṁ appahontassa antobhājaneyeva
anya-e0102n4:141_2: yāva parikkhayā pāko viya upāyāso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n4:143_0: 549.Appiyasampayogo nāma amanāpehi sattasaṅkhārehi samodhānaṁ. So aniṭṭhasamodhānalakkhaṇo,
anya-e0102n4:143_1: cittavighātakaraṇaraso, anatthabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno. Dukkho pana dukkhavatthuto. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:150_0: 550.Piyavippayogo nāma manāpehi sattasaṅkhārehi vinābhāvo. So iṭṭhavatthuviyogalakkhaṇo,
anya-e0102n4:150_1: sokuppādanaraso, byasanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Dukkho pana sokadukkhassa vatthuto. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:157_0: 551.Yampicchaṁ na labhatīti ettha “aho vata mayaṁ na jātidhammā assāmā”tiādīsu alabbhaneyyavatthūsu
anya-e0102n4:157_1: icchāva yampicchaṁ na labhati, tampi dukkhanti vuttā. Sā alabbhaneyyavatthuicchanalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n4:157_2: tappariyesanarasā, tesaṁ appattipaccupaṭṭhānā. Dukkhā pana dukkhavatthuto. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:159: Yaṁ vighātamayaṁ dukkhaṁ, sattānaṁ idha jāyati.
anya-e0102n4:166: Avuttaṁ yañca taṁ sabbaṁ, vinā ete na vijjati.
anya-e0102n4:169_0: Tathā hi indhanamiva pāvako, lakkhamiva paharaṇāni, gorūpaṁ viya ḍaṁsamakasādayo,
anya-e0102n4:169_1: khettamiva lāyakā, gāmaṁ viya gāmaghātakā upādānakkhandhapañcakameva jātiādayo nānappakārehi
anya-e0102n4:169_2: vibādhentā tiṇalatādīni viya bhūmiyaṁ, pupphaphalapallavāni viya rukkhesu upādānakkhandhesuyeva
anya-e0102n4:169_3: nibbattanti. Upādānakkhandhānañca ādidukkhaṁ jāti, majjhedukkhaṁ jarā, pariyosānadukkhaṁ
anya-e0102n4:169_4: maraṇaṁ, māraṇantikadukkhābhighātena pariḍayhanadukkhaṁ soko, tadasahanato lālappanadukkhaṁ
anya-e0102n4:169_6: dukkhaṁ, tena bādhiyamānānaṁ puthujjanānaṁ tattha paṭighuppattito cetobādhanadukkhaṁ
anya-e0102n4:169_7: domanassaṁ, sokādivuddhiyā janitavisādānaṁ anutthunanadukkhaṁ upāyāso, manorathavighātappattānaṁ
anya-e0102n4:169_8: icchāvighātadukkhaṁ icchitālābhoti evaṁ nānappakārato upaparikkhiyamānā upādānakkhandhāva
anya-e0102n4:169_9: dukkhāti. Yadetaṁ ekamekaṁ dassetvā vuccamānaṁ anekehipi kappehi na sakkā asesato
anya-e0102n4:169_10: vattuṁ, tasmā taṁ sabbampi dukkhaṁ ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasaṁ viya yesu
anya-e0102n4:169_11: kesuci pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu saṁkhipitvā dassetuṁ “saṁkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā
anya-e0102n4:169_12: dukkhā”ti bhagavā avocāti. Ayaṁ upādānakkhandhesu vinicchayo.
anya-e0102n4:172_0: 553. Samudayaniddese pana yāyaṁ taṇhāti yā ayaṁ taṇhā. Ponobbhavikāti punabbhavakaraṇaṁ
anya-e0102n4:172_1: punobbhavo, punobbhavo sīlametissāti ponobbhavikā. Nandīrāgena sahagatāti nandīrāgasahagatā,
anya-e0102n4:172_2: nandīrāgena saddhiṁ atthato ekattameva gatāti vuttaṁ hoti. Tatra tatrābhinandinīti
anya-e0102n4:172_3: yatra yatra attabhāvo nibbattati, tatra tatrābhinandinī. Seyyathidanti nipāto, tassa
anya-e0102n4:172_4: sā katamāti ceti attho. Kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti imā paṭiccasamuppādaniddese
anya-e0102n4:172_5: āvibhavissanti. Idha panāyaṁ tividhāpi dukkhasaccassa nibbattakaṭṭhena ekattaṁ upanetvā
anya-e0102n4:175_0: 554. Dukkhanirodhaniddese yo tassāyeva taṇhāyātiādinā nayena samudayanirodho vutto,
anya-e0102n4:175_1: so kasmāti ce? Samudayanirodhena dukkhanirodho. Samudayanirodhena hi dukkhaṁ nirujjhati,
anya-e0102n4:180_0: Iti yasmā samudayanirodheneva dukkhaṁ nirujjhati, tasmā bhagavā dukkhanirodhaṁ desento
anya-e0102n4:180_1: samudayanirodheneva desesi. Sīhasamānavuttino hi tathāgatā. Te dukkhaṁ nirodhentā
anya-e0102n4:180_2: dukkhanirodhañca desentā hetumhi paṭipajjanti, na phale. Suvānavuttino pana titthiyā.
anya-e0102n4:180_3: Te dukkhaṁ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca desentā attakilamathānuyogadesanādīhi phale
anya-e0102n4:180_4: paṭipajjanti, na hetumhīti. Evaṁ tāva dukkhanirodhassa samudayanirodhavasena desanāya
anya-e0102n4:181_0: 555. Ayaṁ panattho – tassāyeva taṇhāyāti tassā “ponobbhavikā”ti vatvā kāmataṇhādivasena
anya-e0102n4:181_1: vibhattataṇhāya. Virāgo vuccati maggo. “Virāgā vimuccatī”ti hi vuttaṁ. Virāgena nirodho
anya-e0102n4:181_2: virāganirodho. Anusayasamugghātato aseso virāganirodho asesavirāganirodho. Atha vā
anya-e0102n4:181_3: virāgoti pahānaṁ vuccati, tasmā aseso virāgo aseso nirodhoti evampettha yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n4:181_4: Atthato pana sabbāneva etāni nibbānassa vevacanāni. Paramatthato hi dukkhanirodho
anya-e0102n4:181_5: ariyasaccanti nibbānaṁ vuccati. Yasmā pana taṁ āgamma taṇhā virajjati ceva nirujjhati
anya-e0102n4:181_6: ca, tasmā virāgoti ca nirodhoti ca vuccati. Yasmā ca tadeva āgamma tassā cāgādayo
anya-e0102n4:181_7: honti, kāmaguṇālayesu cettha ekopi ālayo natthi, tasmā “cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:182: 556. Tayidaṁ santilakkhaṇaṁ, accutirasaṁ, assāsakaraṇarasaṁ vā, animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ, nippapañcapaccupaṭṭhānaṁ vā.
anya-e0102n4:184_0: 557. Nattheva nibbānaṁ, sasavisāṇaṁ viya anupalabbhanīyatoti ce? Na, upāyena upalabbhanīyato.
anya-e0102n4:184_1: Upalabbhati hi taṁ tadanurūpapaṭipattisaṅkhātena upāyena, cetopariyañāṇena paresaṁ
anya-e0102n4:184_2: lokuttaracittaṁ viya, tasmā “anupalabbhanīyato natthī”ti na vattabbaṁ. Na hi “yaṁ
anya-e0102n4:184_3: bālaputhujjanā na upalabhanti, taṁ natthī”ti vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:185_0: 558. Apica nibbānaṁ natthīti na vattabbaṁ, kasmā? Paṭipattiyā vañjhabhāvāpajjanato.
anya-e0102n4:185_1: Asati hi nibbāne sammādiṭṭhipurejavāya sīlādikhandhattayasaṅgahāya sammāpaṭipattiyā
anya-e0102n4:185_2: vañjhabhāvo āpajjati. Na cāyaṁ vañjhā, nibbānapāpanatoti. Na paṭipattiyā vañjhabhāvāpatti,
anya-e0102n4:185_3: abhāvapāpakattāti ce. Na, atītānāgatābhāvepi nibbānapattiyā abhāvato. Vattamānānampi
anya-e0102n4:185_4: abhāvo nibbānanti ce. Na, tesaṁ abhāvāsambhavato, abhāve ca avattamānabhāvāpajjanato,
anya-e0102n4:185_6: Tadā kilesānaṁ avattamānattā na dosoti ce. Na, ariyamaggassa niratthakabhāvāpajjanato.
anya-e0102n4:185_7: Evañhi sati ariyamaggakkhaṇato pubbepi kilesā na santīti ariyamaggassa niratthakabhāvo
anya-e0102n4:186_0: 559. “Yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo”tiādivacanato “khayo nibbāna”nti ce. Na, arahattassāpi
anya-e0102n4:186_1: khayamattāpajjanato. Tampi hi “yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo”tiādinā nayena niddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:186_2: Kiñca bhiyyo nibbānassa ittarakālādippattidosato. Evañhi sati nibbānaṁ ittarakālaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:186_4: ca saṅkhatapariyāpannaṁ, saṅkhatapariyāpannattā rāgādīhi aggīhi ādittaṁ, ādittattā
anya-e0102n4:186_5: dukkhañcātipi āpajjati. Yasmā khayā paṭṭhāya na bhiyyo pavatti nāma hoti, tassa nibbānabhāvato
anya-e0102n4:186_6: na dosoti ce. Na, tādisassa khayassa abhāvato. Bhāvepi cassa vuttappakāradosānativattanato,
anya-e0102n4:186_7: ariyamaggassa ca nibbānabhāvāpajjanato. Ariyamaggo hi dose khīṇeti, tasmā khayoti
anya-e0102n4:186_8: vuccati. Tato ca paṭṭhāya na bhiyyo dosānaṁ pavattīti.
anya-e0102n4:187_0: Anuppattinirodhasaṅkhātassa pana khayassa pariyāyena upanissayattā, yassa upanissayo
anya-e0102n4:187_1: hoti tadupacārena “khayo”ti vuttaṁ. Sarūpeneva kasmā na vuttanti ce. Atisukhumattā.
anya-e0102n4:187_2: Atisukhumatā cassa bhagavato apposukkabhāvāvahanato, ariyena cakkhunā passitabbato ca siddhāti.
anya-e0102n4:188_0: 560. Tayidaṁ maggasamaṅginā pattabbato asādhāraṇaṁ, purimakoṭiyā abhāvato appabhavaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:188_1: Maggabhāve bhāvato na appabhavanti ce. Na, maggena anuppādanīyato. Pattabbameva hetaṁ
anya-e0102n4:188_2: maggena, na uppādetabbaṁ. Tasmā appabhavameva. Appabhavattā ajarāmaraṇaṁ. Pabhavajarāmaraṇānaṁ abhāvato niccaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:189_0: Nibbānasseva aṇuādīnampi niccabhāvāpattīti ce. Na, hetuno abhāvā. Nibbānassa niccattā
anya-e0102n4:189_1: te niccāti ce. Na, hetulakkhaṇassa anupapattito. Niccā uppādādīnaṁ abhāvato nibbānaṁ
anya-e0102n4:190_0: 561. Yathāvuttayuttisabbhāvato pana idameva niccaṁ, rūpasabhāvātikkamato arūpaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:190_1: Buddhādīnaṁ niṭṭhāya visesābhāvato ekāva niṭṭhā. Yena bhāvanāya pattaṁ, tassa kilesavūpasamaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:190_2: upādisesañca upādāya paññāpanīyattā saha upādisesena paññāpiyatīti saupādisesaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:190_3: Yo cassa samudayappahānena upahatāyatikammaphalassa carimacittato ca uddhaṁ pavattikhandhānaṁ
anya-e0102n4:190_4: anuppādanato, uppannānañca antaradhānato upādisesābhāvo, taṁ upādāya paññāpanīyato
anya-e0102n4:191_0: Asithilaparakkamasiddhena ñāṇavisesena adhigamanīyato, sabbaññuvacanato ca paramatthena
anya-e0102n4:191_1: sabhāvato nibbānaṁ nāvijjamānaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhata”nti.
anya-e0102n4:194_0: 562. Dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāniddese vuttā pana aṭṭha dhammā kāmaṁ khandhaniddesepi
anya-e0102n4:194_1: atthato pakāsitāyeva, idha pana nesaṁ ekakkhaṇe pavattamānānaṁ visesāvabodhanatthaṁ
anya-e0102n4:194_2: vadāma. Saṅkhepato hi catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassa yogino nibbānārammaṇaṁ avijjānusayasamugghātakaṁ
anya-e0102n4:194_3: paññācakkhu sammādiṭṭhi. Sā sammā dassanalakkhaṇā, dhātuppakāsanarasā, avijjandhakāraviddhaṁsanapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0102n4:194_4: Tathā sampannadiṭṭhino taṁsampayuttaṁ micchāsaṅkappanighātakaṁ cetaso nibbānapadābhiniropanaṁ
anya-e0102n4:194_5: sammāsaṅkappo. So sammā cittābhiniropanalakkhaṇo, appanāraso, micchāsaṅkappappahānapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0102n4:195_0: Tathā passato vitakkayato ca taṁsampayuttāva vacīduccaritasamugghātikā micchāvācāya
anya-e0102n4:195_1: virati sammāvācā nāma. Sā pariggahalakkhaṇā, viramaṇarasā, micchāvācāppahānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0102n4:195_2: Tathā viramato taṁsampayuttāva micchākammantasamucchedikā pāṇātipātādivirati sammākammanto
anya-e0102n4:195_4: Yā panassa tesaṁ sammāvācākammantānaṁ visuddhibhūtā taṁsampayuttāva kuhanādiupacchedikā
anya-e0102n4:195_5: micchājīvavirati, so sammāājīvo nāma. So vodānalakkhaṇo, ñāyājīvapavattiraso, micchājīvappahānapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0102n4:196_0: Athassa yo tassā sammāvācākammantājīvasaṅkhātāya sīlabhūmiyaṁ patiṭṭhitassa tadanurūpo
anya-e0102n4:196_1: taṁsampayuttova kosajjasamucchedako vīriyārambho, esa sammāvāyāmo nāma. So paggahalakkhaṇo,
anya-e0102n4:196_3: taṁsampayuttova micchāsativiniddhunano cetaso asammoso sammāsati nāma. Sā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n4:196_4: asammussanarasā, micchāsatippahānapaccupaṭṭhānā. Evaṁ anuttarāya satiyā saṁrakkhiyamānacittassa
anya-e0102n4:196_5: taṁsampayuttāva micchāsamādhividdhaṁsikā cittekaggatā sammāsamādhi nāma. So avikkhepalakkhaṇo,
anya-e0102n4:197_0: 563.Ñāṇakiccatoti saccañāṇassa kiccatopi vinicchayo veditabbo. Duvidhaṁ hi saccañāṇaṁ
anya-e0102n4:197_1: – anubodhañāṇaṁ paṭivedhañāṇañca. Tattha anubodhañāṇaṁ lokiyaṁ anussavādivasena nirodhe
anya-e0102n4:197_2: magge ca pavattati. Paṭivedhañāṇaṁ lokuttaraṁ nirodhamārammaṇaṁ katvā kiccato cattāri
anya-e0102n4:197_3: saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yathāha – “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ passati, dukkhasamudayampi
anya-e0102n4:197_4: so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadampi passatī”ti
anya-e0102n4:197_5: sabbaṁ vattabbaṁ. Taṁ panassa kiccaṁ ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṁ āvibhavissati.
anya-e0102n4:198_0: Yaṁ panetaṁ lokiyaṁ, tattha dukkhañāṇaṁ pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavavasena pavattamānaṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ
anya-e0102n4:198_1: nivatteti. Samudayañāṇaṁ ucchedadiṭṭhiṁ. Nirodhañāṇaṁ sassatadiṭṭhiṁ. Maggañāṇaṁ
anya-e0102n4:198_2: akiriyadiṭṭhiṁ. Dukkhañāṇaṁ vā dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitesu khandhesu dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasaññāsaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0102n4:198_3: phale vippaṭipattiṁ. Samudayañāṇaṁ issarapadhānakālasabhāvādīhi loko pavattatīti
anya-e0102n4:198_4: akāraṇe kāraṇābhimānappavattaṁ hetumhi vippaṭipattiṁ. Nirodhañāṇaṁ arūpalokalokathūpikādīsu
anya-e0102n4:198_6: avisuddhimagge visuddhimaggagāhavasena pavattaṁ upāye vippaṭipattiṁ nivatteti. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:200: Sammuyhati tāva naro, na vijānāti yāva saccānī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:202_0: 564.Antogadhānaṁ pabhedāti dukkhasaccasmiṁ hi ṭhapetvā taṇhañceva anāsavadhamme ca
anya-e0102n4:202_1: sesā sabbadhammā antogadhā. Samudayasacce chattiṁsa taṇhāvicaritāni. Nirodhasaccaṁ
anya-e0102n4:202_3: Sammāsaṅkappāpadesena tayo nekkhammavitakkādayo. Sammāvācāpadesena cattāri vacīsucaritāni.
anya-e0102n4:202_4: Sammākammantāpadesena tīṇi kāyasucaritāni. Sammājīvamukhena appicchatā santuṭṭhitā
anya-e0102n4:202_5: ca. Sabbesaṁyeva vā etesaṁ sammāvācākammantājīvānaṁ ariyakantasīlattā ariyakantasīlassa
anya-e0102n4:202_6: ca saddhāhatthena paṭiggahetabbattā tesaṁ atthitāya atthibhāvato saddhindriyasaddhābalachandiddhipādā.
anya-e0102n4:202_10: antogadhānīti evamettha antogadhānaṁ pabhedatopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:203_0: 565.Upamātoti bhāro viya hi dukkhasaccaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, bhārādānamiva samudayasaccaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:203_1: bhāranikkhepanamiva nirodhasaccaṁ, bhāranikkhepanupāyo viya maggasaccaṁ. Rogo viya
anya-e0102n4:203_2: ca dukkhasaccaṁ, roganidānamiva samudayasaccaṁ, rogavūpasamo viya nirodhasaccaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:203_3: bhesajjamiva maggasaccaṁ. Dubbhikkhamiva vā dukkhasaccaṁ, dubbuṭṭhi viya samudayasaccaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:203_4: subhikkhamiva nirodhasaccaṁ, suvuṭṭhi viya maggasaccaṁ. Apica verī-veramūla-verasamugghāta-verasamugghātupāyehi,
anya-e0102n4:204_0: 566.Catukkatoti atthi cettha dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ, atthi ariyasaccaṁ na dukkhaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:204_1: atthi dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca, atthi neva dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ. Esa nayo samudayādīsu.
anya-e0102n4:204_2: Tattha maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca “yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha”nti vacanato
anya-e0102n4:204_3: saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhaṁ, na ariyasaccaṁ. Nirodho ariyasaccaṁ, na dukkhaṁ. Itaraṁ
anya-e0102n4:204_4: pana ariyasaccadvayaṁ siyā dukkhaṁ aniccato, na pana yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ
anya-e0102n4:204_5: vussati tathattena. Sabbākārena pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṁ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca
anya-e0102n4:204_6: aññatra taṇhāya. Maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pariññatthaṁ bhagavati
anya-e0102n4:204_7: brahmacariyaṁ vussati tathattena neva dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ. Evaṁ samudayādīsupi
anya-e0102n4:205: 567. Suññatekavidhādīhītiettha suññato tāva paramatthena hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:213_0: Nirodhasuññāni vā tīṇi, nirodho ca sesattayasuñño. Phalasuñño vā ettha hetu samudaye
anya-e0102n4:213_1: dukkhassābhāvato, magge ca nirodhassa, na phalena sagabbho pakativādīnaṁ pakati viya.
anya-e0102n4:213_2: Hetusuññañca phalaṁ dukkhasamudayānaṁ nirodhamaggānañca asamavāyā, na hetusamavetaṁ
anya-e0102n4:213_3: hetuphalaṁ samavāyavādīnaṁ dviaṇukādi viya. Tenetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0102n4:215: Suñño phalena hetu, phalampi taṁhetunā suñña”nti.
anya-e0102n4:218_0: 568.Ekavidhādīhīti sabbameva cettha dukkhaṁ ekavidhaṁ pavattibhāvato. Duvidhaṁ nāmarūpato.
anya-e0102n4:219_0: Samudayopi ekavidho pavattakabhāvato. Duvidho diṭṭhisampayuttāsampayuttato. Tividho
anya-e0102n4:220_0: Nirodhopi ekavidho asaṅkhatadhātubhāvato. Pariyāyena pana duvidho saupādisesaanupādisesabhedato.
anya-e0102n4:220_1: Tividho bhavattayavūpasamato. Catubbidho catumaggādhigamanīyato. Pañcavidho pañcābhinandanavūpasamato.
anya-e0102n4:221_0: Maggopi ekavidho bhāvetabbato. Duvidho samathavipassanābhedato, dassanabhāvanābhedato
anya-e0102n4:221_1: vā. Tividho khandhattayabhedato. Ayañhi sappadesattā nagaraṁ viya rajjena nippadesehi
anya-e0102n4:222_0: “Na kho, āvuso visākha, ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā, tīhi
anya-e0102n4:222_1: ca kho, āvuso visākha, khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito. Yā cāvuso visākha,
anya-e0102n4:222_2: sammāvācā, yo ca sammākammanto, yo ca sammāājīvo, ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā.
anya-e0102n4:222_3: Yo ca sammāvāyāmo, yā ca sammāsati, yo ca sammāsamādhi, ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe
anya-e0102n4:222_4: saṅgahitā. Yā ca sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti.
anya-e0102n4:223_0: Ettha hi sammāvācādayo tayo sīlameva, tasmā te sajātito sīlakkhandhena saṅgahitā.
anya-e0102n4:223_1: Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṁ sīlakkhandheti bhummena niddeso kato, attho pana karaṇavaseneva
anya-e0102n4:223_2: veditabbo. Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena
anya-e0102n4:223_3: appetuṁ na sakkoti, vīriye pana paggahakiccaṁ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṁ
anya-e0102n4:224_0: Tatrāyaṁ upamā – yathā hi nakkhattaṁ kīḷissāmāti uyyānaṁ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu
anya-e0102n4:224_1: eko supupphitaṁ campakarukkhaṁ disvā hatthaṁ ukkhipitvā gahetumpi na sakkuṇeyya.
anya-e0102n4:224_2: Athassa dutiyo onamitvā piṭṭhiṁ dadeyya, so tassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṁ
anya-e0102n4:224_3: na sakkuṇeyya. Athassa itaro aṁsakūṭaṁ upanāmeyya. So ekassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvā ekassa
anya-e0102n4:224_4: aṁsakūṭaṁ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṁ kīḷeyya. Evaṁsampadamidaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:225_0: Ekato uyyānaṁ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo tayo dhammā.
anya-e0102n4:225_1: Supupphitacampako viya ārammaṇaṁ. Hatthaṁ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṁ asakkonto viya attano
anya-e0102n4:225_2: dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ asakkonto samādhi. Piṭṭhiṁ datvā onatasahāyo
anya-e0102n4:225_3: viya vāyāmo. Aṁsakūṭaṁ datvā ṭhitasahāyo viya sati. Yathā tesu ekassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvā
anya-e0102n4:225_4: ekassa aṁsakūṭaṁ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṁ gahetuṁ sakkoti, evameva vīriye
anya-e0102n4:225_5: paggahakiccaṁ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṁ sādhentiyā laddhupakāro samādhi
anya-e0102n4:225_6: sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ. Tasmā samādhiyevettha sajātito samādhikkhandhena
anya-e0102n4:225_7: saṅgahito, vāyāmasatiyo pana kiriyato saṅgahitā honti.
anya-e0102n4:226_0: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappesupi paññā attano dhammatāya aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti ārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n4:226_1: nicchetuṁ na sakkoti. Vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṁ? Yathā
anya-e0102n4:226_2: hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṁ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhutaleneva
anya-e0102n4:226_3: parivattetuṁ sakkoti. Aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṁ
anya-e0102n4:226_4: sakkoti, evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṁ nicchetuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n4:226_5: Abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena
anya-e0102n4:226_6: viya ca ādāyādāya dinnameva nicchetuṁ sakkoti. Tasmā idhāpi sammādiṭṭhiyeva sajātito
anya-e0102n4:226_7: paññākkhandhena saṅgahitā, sammāsaṅkappo pana kiriyavasena saṅgahito hoti.
anya-e0102n4:227: Iti imehi tīhi khandhehi maggo saṅgahaṁ gacchati. Tena vuttaṁ “tividho khandhattayabhedato”ti. Catubbidho sotāpattimaggādivaseneva.
anya-e0102n4:228_0: Apica sabbāneva saccāni ekavidhāni avitathattā, abhiññeyyattā vā. Duvidhāni lokiyalokuttarato,
anya-e0102n4:228_1: saṅkhatāsaṅkhatato vā. Tividhāni dassana-bhāvanāhi pahātabbato, appahātabbato ca.
anya-e0102n4:228_2: Catubbidhāni pariññeyyādibhedatoti evamettha ekavidhādīhi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:229: 569.Sabhāgavisabhāgatoti sabbāneva saccāni aññamaññaṁ sabhāgāni avitathato attasuññato dukkarapaṭivedhato ca. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:230_0: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, ānanda, katamaṁ nu kho dukkarataraṁ vā durabhisambhavataraṁ vā,
anya-e0102n4:230_1: yo vā dūratova sukhumena tāḷacchiggaḷena asanaṁ atipāteyya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ avirādhitaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:230_2: yo vā satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyāti? Etadeva, bhante, dukkaratarañceva
anya-e0102n4:230_3: durabhisambhavatarañca, yo vā satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyāti.
anya-e0102n4:230_4: Tato kho te, ānanda, duppaṭivijjhataraṁ paṭivijjhanti. Ye idaṁ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṁ
anya-e0102n4:230_5: paṭivijjhanti…pe… ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yathābhūtaṁ paṭivijjhantī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:231_0: Visabhāgāni salakkhaṇavavatthānato. Purimāni ca dve sabhāgāni duravagāhatthena gambhīrattā
anya-e0102n4:231_1: lokiyattā sāsavattā ca. Visabhāgāni phalahetubhedato pariññeyyappahātabbato ca. Pacchimānipi
anya-e0102n4:231_2: dve sabhāgāni gambhīrattena duravagāhattā lokuttarattā anāsavattā ca. Visabhāgāni
anya-e0102n4:231_3: visayavisayībhedato sacchikātabbabhāvetabbato ca. Paṭhamatatiyāni cāpi sabhāgāni
anya-e0102n4:231_4: phalāpadesato. Visabhāgāni saṅkhatāsaṅkhatato. Dutiyacatutthāni cāpi sabhāgāni hetuapadesato.
anya-e0102n4:231_5: Visabhāgāni ekantakusalākusalato. Paṭhamacatutthāni cāpi sabhāgāni saṅkhatato. Visabhāgāni
anya-e0102n4:231_6: lokiyalokuttarato. Dutiyatatiyāni cāpi sabhāgāni nevasekkhānāsekkhabhāvato. Visabhāgāni
anya-e0102n4:232: Iti evaṁ pakārehi, nayehi ca vicakkhaṇo;
